slides.headline: LEATHER PATCH HAT
slides.paragraph: Branded By Hand in Carlsbad, CA

ComplexFeatureTextContainerA.headline: The WestWard Story
ComplexFeatureTextContainerA.subheadline: Wood and Leather Goods For The Good
ComplexFeatureTextContainerA.description1: WestWard Makers is a for-profit company that exists to fund partnered charitable organizations and spread God’s love through the work of business and craftsmanship.
ComplexFeatureTextContainerA.description2: Our focus is creating quality wood and leather goods for the purpose of giving 25% of our profits to partnered charitable organizations. By having a low profit company, we are set up to work for people rather than for money. Whatever we do, we will work with all of our hearts to ensure we establish good works with our hands for the Greater Good.

ComplexFeatureTextContainerB.headline: Founder's Story
ComplexFeatureTextContainerB.description: My Dad once told me, 'if you put a little bit of time and effort into something everyday, after a while you will have something huge.' I put this piece of wisdom to practice and made it through business school, made investments with the resources that were available to me, and invested my time into people. I learned the greatest asset a business could have is its people. It was evident after working four years in a successful startup company in Carlsbad, CA, because the people were incredible and so talented. Now using the same mentality of working for people rather than money begins our new journey WestWard; working with our hands and Loving people.

topBlock.topSubheadline: You change the world... We'll do the rest!
topBlock.topDescription: The Cause is a faith-based nonprofit providing an organizational covering for projects that demonstrate God’s love and improve lives around the world. This is our secret: The Cause is not actually about The Cause…we are about our partners! Our mission is to help our partners accomplish their missions. Our vision is to empower a community of people dedicated to making a difference in the world. Our goal is to provide our partners with a solid administrative backing while strengthening our partners’ God-given abilities through leadership and financial coaching, as well as offering spiritual and emotional support.

topBlock.topSubheadline: A world in which all children are physically and spiritually nourished.
topBlock.topDescription: In response to Jesus’ command to feed the hungry, Outside the Bowl is dedicated to eliminating physical and spiritual starvation in impoverished communities by building Super Kitchens, and working with established community partners to serve hot, nutritious meals to those who need them most.

topBlock.topSubheadline: See the World. Surf the World. Change the World.
topBlock.topDescription: An organization that unifies communities with the common ground of surfing. This group is welcome to all ages and they meet up in chapters based on your geographic location. Chapters share six core ideas, which give them the Christian Surfers DNA: Fellowship: We are a fellowship of surfers following Jesus together; Service: Partner with charities to serve the local beach communities; Intentional Relationships: We follow the biblical mandate to make disciples of Christ, so we journey together to grow in our faith in Christ; Leadership: The leaders of the chapters organize the meetings and serve as leaders; Membership: Partnering with local churches to be held accountable; Surfing: Made up of surfers dedicated to the lifestyle of riding waves, chasing waves, obsessing over surfboards, talking about surfing legends…
